#summary Documentation of the Rend_Factory_Auth class.
#labels Factories,Phase-Implementation

= Description =
This class is an [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abstract_factory_pattern Abstract Factory] for the [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.auth.html Zend_Auth] class.

= API =
|| *Method* || *Description* ||
|| create() || Get the [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.auth.html Zend_Auth] singleton instance ||

= Examples =
== Basic ==
Basic usage of the !Rend_Factory_Database is to create an instance of the factory and call it's create() method on demand.

{{{
class MyController extends Rend_Controller_Action {
    public function init() {
        $this->_authFactory = new Rend_Factory_Auth();
    }
    public function myAction() {
        $auth = $this->authFactory->create();
        if (!$auth->hasIdentity()) {
            die('You must be authenticated before you can access this page');
        }
    }
}
}}}
